mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE BOARD_NO IN (SELECT BOARD_NO FROM FESTIVAL WHERE SYSDATE NOT BETWEEN START_DATE AND END_DATE)
UPDATE BOARD SET STATUS = 'Y' WHERE BOARD_NO IN (SELECT BOARD_NO FROM FESTIVAL WHERE SYSDATE BETWEEN START_DATE AND END_DATE)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE CATEGORY = 6

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, INFO_ADDRESS, TO_CHAR(START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') "START_DATE", TO_CHAR(END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') "END_DATE", FILE_PATH FROM BOARD B JOIN INFO USING(BOARD_NO) JOIN FESTIVAL USING(BOARD_NO) JOIN ATTACHMENT USING(BOARD_NO) WHERE CATEGORY = 6 AND FILE_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY (CASE WHEN SYSDATE BETWEEN START_DATE AND END_DATE THEN 1 WHEN SYSDATE < START_DATE THEN 2 ELSE 3 END), (CASE WHEN (CASE WHEN SYSDATE BETWEEN START_DATE AND END_DATE THEN 1 WHEN SYSDATE < START_DATE THEN 2 ELSE 3 END) = 3 THEN START_DATE END) DESC, START_DATE ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM(SELECT A.* FROM(SELECT * FROM FESTIVAL F JOIN BOARD USING(BOARD_NO)
WHERE #{nowDay} BETWEEN START_DATE AND END_DATE) A)

SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM(SELECT A.* FROM(SELECT * FROM FESTIVAL F JOIN BOARD USING(BOARD_NO) JOIN ZONE Z ON (F.ZONE_NO = Z.ZONE_NO)
AND #{date} BETWEEN TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(START_DATE),4,2)) AND TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(END_DATE),4,2))
AND ZONE_NAME LIKE #{area}||'%'
AND FES_CATEGORY = #{cate}
AND #{day} BETWEEN START_DATE AND END_DATE
ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A)

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, INFO_ADDRESS, TO_CHAR(START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') "START_DATE", TO_CHAR(END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') "END_DATE", FILE_PATH FROM BOARD B JOIN INFO USING(BOARD_NO) JOIN FESTIVAL F USING(BOARD_NO) JOIN ATTACHMENT USING(BOARD_NO) JOIN ZONE Z ON (F.ZONE_NO = Z.ZONE_NO)
WHERE FILE_LEVEL = 1
AND #{date} BETWEEN TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(START_DATE),4,2)) AND TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(END_DATE),4,2))
AND ZONE_NAME LIKE #{area}||'%'
AND FES_CATEGORY = #{cate}
AND #{day} BETWEEN START_DATE AND END_DATE
ORDER BY (CASE WHEN SYSDATE BETWEEN START_DATE AND END_DATE THEN 1 WHEN SYSDATE < START_DATE THEN 2 ELSE 3 END), (CASE WHEN (CASE WHEN SYSDATE BETWEEN START_DATE AND END_DATE THEN 1 WHEN SYSDATE < START_DATE THEN 2 ELSE 3 END) = 3 THEN START_DATE END) DESC, START_DATE ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARD_NO, ZONE_NO, INFO_NO, CATEGORY, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_WRITER) VALUES (SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL,#{zoneNo},SEQ_INO.NEXTVAL,6,#{boardTitle},#{boardContent},#{boardWriter})

INSERT INTO INFO (INFO_NO, BOARD_NO, ZONE_NO, INFO_ADDRESS, INFO_TIME, INFO_HOMEPAGE, INFO_CALL, INFO_TYPE) VALUES(SEQ_INO.CURRVAL, SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL, #{zoneNo}, #{infoAddress}, #{infoTime}, #{infoHomepage}, #{infoCall}, 3)
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT(FILE_NO, BOARD_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL) VALUES(SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL,#{originName},#{changeName},#{filePath},#{fileLevel})

INSERT INTO FESTIVAL(BOARD_NO, ZONE_NO, INFO_NO, START_DATE, END_DATE, FES_CATEGORY, FES_MONEY) VALUES(SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL, #{zoneNo}, SEQ_INO.CURRVAL, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{fesCategory}, #{fesMoney})
